short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What was Wikipedia said about the text you selected...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WikiNediyo - Quick Wikipedia Lookup

Ever find yourself wondering about the meaning or background of a word while browsing the web? With WikiNediyo, you can instantly access Wikipedia explanations without leaving your current page. Simply select the text, right-click to open the context menu, and choose WikiNediyo. A frameless popup will appear with the relevant Wikipedia search result.

Features:
Instant Lookup: Quickly get Wikipedia explanations for any selected text.
Frameless Popup: Enjoy a seamless experience with a clean, distraction-free popup.
Coming Soon:
Multilingual Support: Future versions will include the ability to search Wikipedia pages in multiple languages.
Current Version:
Language: This version supports searches in Turkish only.
Enhance your browsing experience with WikiNediyo and make learning effortless!
